item.title: Trump to speak at Davos as his Greenland push, tariff threats take center stage
item.description: Trump said over the weekend that he would slap tariffs on imports from eight European countries in retaliation for moving troops to Greenland.

item.title: Supreme Court case on Trump bid to fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook set for oral arguments
item.description: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell plans to attend the oral arguments at the Supreme Court.

item.title: Greenland should be prepared for 'everything,' prime minister says, not ruling out U.S. military action
item.description: While the scenario is unlikely, Greenland has to be prepared as "the other side" has not ruled out the use of military force.

item.title: Trump signs order to restrict Wall Street firms from buying single-family homes
item.description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Tuesday aiming to stop Wall Street investors from competing with individual homebuyers, the White ...

item.title: 'You'll find out,' Trump says on Greenland takeover strategy
item.description: Trump will be meeting with world leaders at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, later this week.
